p: In conclusion, increasing the lipophilicity of the isatin scaffold via C-5 substitution with halogens (Br > Cl) was more advantageous for activity. Also, the anti-mycobacterial action of the target hybrids was decreased in the following order; 6-methoxy nicotinohydrazide > unsubstituted nicotinohydrazide > 2-methyl-6-phenyl nicotinohydrazide ( Figure 3).
